protocol.name: P-GSE55907-1
protocol.text: The data were analyzed with LIMMA package of Bioconductor using GCRMA normalization procedure. ID_REF =  VALUE = GCRMA-normalized log2 expression signal

protocol.name: P-GSE55907-2
protocol.text: For cold treatment, plants were treated at 4°C under continuous light at ~30 µmol m–2 s–1 for 24-h

protocol.name: P-GSE55907-3
protocol.text: Plants were grown at 22°C under sterile conditions on solid agar medium which contained Gamborg's B5 medium (Caisson Laboratories) without sucrose and 0.8 % Phytoblend for 12 days at ~100 µmol m–2 s–1 constant light.

protocol.name: P-GSE55907-4
protocol.text: RNA was extracted using the RNeasy plant mini kit (Qiagen)

protocol.name: P-GSE55907-5
protocol.text: RNA was amplified and biotinylated using a MessageAmp kit (Ambion) according to the manufacturer's protocol

protocol.name: P-GSE55907-6
protocol.text: Hybridization and washing were carried out according to the Gene Chip manufacturer's protocol (Affymetrix)

protocol.name: P-GSE55907-7
protocol.text: Scan protocols were carried out according to the Gene Chip manufacturer's protocol (Affymetrix)
